This should not happen. It looks like somehow  a Search view is added or removed
while a (previous?) Search is going on (or the other way around).

Do you experiment with some background threading?

Any hint on how to reproduce?

Note: I now protected the code but I think the error happens somewhere else.

Removed the protection code again there must be some other issue here.
Did your workbench crash or run out of memory?
No. I was working (I use -consoleLog) and I saw this exception in the console  
but I did not see any problem in the UI.
Please reopen if you see this again.
